archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0411
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a BSS Solution, I must be able to register a user, including personal information for billing and credit checking, as well as assign roles and relationships to subscriptions, accounts, customers, and organisations.

properties.value: registering an user is OOTB, but more details to be discussed (who should be allowed to create this user, could this user create another users, etc)

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
